content.question: The primary purpose of the First World War poster shown above was to

choices.label: encourage women to serve in the armed forces along with men
encourage and facilitate female recruitment in the munitions industry
encourage men to volunteer for military service
evacuate women and children to rural areas for safety

content.answer: encourage men to volunteer for military service

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
